name: yoink
title: Yoink
description: Add selected or clipboard files to Yoink.
author: koinzhang

commands.name: add-to-yoink
commands.title: Add to Yoink
commands.description: Add selected or clipboard files to Yoink.

preferences.title: Notification
preferences.name: showNotification
preferences.label: Show Notification
preferences.description: Show notification when files are added to Yoink

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
